channel.title: BuildInPublic on Niko Okio
channel.description: Recent content in BuildInPublic on Niko Okio

item.title: How to build a SaaS application
item.description: How to build a SaaS application A software as a service (SaaS) application is a software application delivered over the internet. SaaS applications are usually subscription based, with users paying a monthly or annual fee. If you’re thinking of building a SaaS application, there are a few things you’ll need to keep in mind. In this blog post, I’ll guide you through the high level process of building a SaaS application, from start to finish and how I’m tackling it!

item.title: Welcome to my journey
item.description: Hi there üëãüèª I’m Niko and starting to build in public! This can be a scary step in the beginning, because everything you do will be judged by the public. But on the other hand you get a lot of valuable inputs and feedback along the journey. So it’s defenitly worth it! My Goal üéØ for now is to launch 2+ Products in 2022, gain some customers that pay me and learn a lot of things on the go!
